name: Type 2 Diabetes Prediction Using Routine EHR Data
description: A disease prediction project using state-of-the-art machine learning techniques to leverage patient medical history for predicting the likelihood of type 2 diabetes. The project identified novel features and created multiple machine and deep learning classifiers, along with a framework for early detection that outputs predictions with confidence scores.
role: Reviewed existing literature and disease prediction systems to design a solution using available patient data at CureMD
Identified features suitable for predicting type 2 diabetes in the absence of direct lab results
Designed a novel deep neural network architecture and a framework for quantifying prediction uncertainty
Authored a research article based on the project for publication
